Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest Highway/Nagle
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Northwest Highway, Devon and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nagle

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Northwest Highway, Devon and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nagle.

Allow extra travel time.
